__e: Why don't you just make it easy for yourself and confess?
And maybe it's not my place to say this, but you have to know.
I know you can do it, but it's just admitting your guilt if you try.
I... l-I must admit I'm surprised to hear that.
I must admit it: I'm crazy about him.
I must say, I'm so glad you called. - I'm so glad you answered.
Penny, there's something I gotta confess... something I gotta tell you.
Not that I'm ungrateful to Providence for bringing you back but I have to confess I'm a bit curious as to how you managed to wind up with them.
Well,that's good to hear. 'Cause as it turns out,I don't know my secret.
And I have to confess, I actually had another reason for stopping by.
Gotta tell ya, I really miss him when he's not here, you know.
Sir, I must confess that I failed to tell you the truth.
Women owe much to the hierarchy, after all, council of Nice declared women have souls as well.
As bitter as it is to admit to you, I have to say that your father was right.
Everything will continue to be fine as long as you remember who's the boss... and who's got the power.
All that's left for you to do is to clear the air of all these murders and be done with it all.
I've been wanting to confess something to you for a while now, and I'm not quite sure why I haven't told you.
All I wanted was for them to confess, and they wouldn't.
How do you expect me to confess to that which is not true?"
You're just trying to get me to admit something I didn't do.
So I guess this is a good time to tell you that this is not your baby.
